featured.text: With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.
__(39)__ men and women are able to respect and accept their differences, love has a chance to blossom.
Bam once blossomed as a trading post on the Silk Road.

definition.zh_def: 花朵，特別是樹木或植物的花開時期。
definition.en_def: The flower of a plant, especially one that produces fruit.
definition.example: The cherry trees blossom beautifully in spring.
